items.title: LEICA M-A (TYP 127), BLACK CHROME FINISH
items.description: Leica Camera proudly presents the Leica M-A, an analog, fully mechanical camera body that works without a battery. Returning to the basic aspects of photography - focus, aperture and shutter speed, this analog camera stays true to the roots of photography. Unlike the analog Leica MP, the Leica M-A does not have a built in light meter.

items.title: LEICA M-A (TYP 127), SILVER CHROME FINISH
items.description: Leica Camera proudly presents the Leica M-A, an analog, fully mechanical camera body that works without a battery. Returning to the basic aspects of photography - focus, aperture and shutter speed, this analog camera stays true to the roots of photography. Unlike the analog Leica MP, the Leica M-A does not have a built in light meter.

items.title: LEICA M7 - BLACK (0.72)
items.description: Leica Camera proudly presents the Leica M-A, an analog, fully mechanical camera body that works without a battery. Returning to the basic aspects of photography - focus, aperture and shutter speed, this analog camera stays true to the roots of photography. Unlike the analog Leica MP, the Leica M-A does not have a built in light meter.

items.title: LEICA SL (TYP 601) RIGHT ANGLE FINDER
items.description: A limited edition product, light but durable, this is one of our flagship products. It’s popular and it’s the perfect gift for all occasions.

items.title: LEICA SL (TYP 601), BLACK
items.description:
Easy, reduced, functional - Leica professional
The Leica SL (Typ 601) represents the pinnacle of design and technology from Leica Camera and is the perfect tool for professionals. Featuring a full-frame, self-cleaning 24 megpixel CMOS sensor, the SL offers the highest possible image quality with the fewest compromises. An integrated 4.4 megapixel electronic viewfinder with 0.8x magnification gives a huge field of view and a bright, crisp overview of the scene. Auto focus speed is class-leading. As an interchangeable lens mirrorless camera, the SL is packed with advanced features such as full weather and dust sealing, a touch-screen rear LCD, Wi-Fi and GPS, dual SD card slots, 4k video, 11 fps burst rate and a versatile lens mount. In addition to the new line of full-frame Leica L lenses, the SL (Typ 601) accepts Leica T-System lenses natively (and automatically crops to an APS-C mode). Leica M, S, R, and cine lenses can be mounted with various Accessories_Adapters.

items.title: LEICA SL LI-ION BATTERY BP-SCL 4
items.description: Spare battery for the Leica SL (Typ 601).

items.title: LEICA SL REMOTE RELEASE CABLE RC-SCL4
items.description: The remote-release cable  enables vibration-free shutter release, for example for time exposures or multiple exposures for HDR images. It also offers a shutter release lock as a perfect aid when shooting in bulb mode (B), with which exposures of up to 30 minutes are possible.

items.title: LEICA S (TYP 006)
items.description: The next generation in the successful line, the Leica S offers increased imaging quality and sensor sensitivity, predictive autofocus, higher speed and improved handling. Numerous enhanced functions contribute to the camera's further acceleration and greater security of the professional photographic workflow.

items.title: LEICA S (TYP 006) / 70MM LENS SET
items.description: The Leica S (Typ 006) + Leica Summarit-S 70mm f/2.5 ASPH kit combines Leica’s top-of-the-line medium format digital camera body with one of the most versatile lenses in the Leica S-System. The Leica S (Typ 006) is a 37.5 megapixel medium format digital SLR that merges superb image quality with a fully weather and dust sealed body designed from scratch to be ergonomic and straightforward to use. This kit will allow you to immediately begin your photographic adventure; simply add a memory card and start shooting.

items.title: LEICA S (TYP 007)
items.description:
New: LEICA S. Live view CMOS, high speed 3.5fps, 4K video recording and optimum image quality – combined with perfect handling

For a complete review of the Leica S (typ 007) with sample images from NYC and Iceland, check out Red Dot Forum.

items.title: LEICA S EDITION 100 SET
items.description: On the occasion of this very special anniversary, 2014 will see not only numerous events, but also a series of centennial editions. These products are a testament to Leica’s 100 years of innovation and dedication to excellence in photography since Oskar Barnack’s invention of the first Leica, “Ur-Leica” in 1913/1914. The first of these special centennial editions is the Leica S 'Edition 100'. This centennial edition comprises a Leica S (Typ 006) medium-format system camera and two of the most popular S lenses, both with a central shutter, offering exceptional versatility in a wide range of situations - the Leica Summarit-S 70mm f/2.5 ASPH CS and the Leica Elmarit-S 30mm f/2.8 ASPH CS.

items.title: LEICA M (TYP 240) À LA CARTE PROGRAM
items.description: Create a Leica M (Typ 240) camera that suits you perfectly with Leica's new à la carte program. Using Leica's online configurator, there are thousands of possibilities to make your M (Typ 240) truly unique. The following options are available:

items.title: LEICA M (TYP 240) EDITION "LEICA 60"
items.description: Leica Camera proudly presents the Leica M Edition “LEICA 60” set that pays homage to Leica’s tradition while embracing the future. This set comprises of the first digital camera to concentrate exclusively on the bare functions of photography - shutter speed, aperture, focusing and ISO sensitivity and a newly designed Leica Summilux-M 35mm f/1.4 ASPH stainless steel lens. The camera design excludes the LCD and shoots in RAW. Designed in collaboration with Audi Design, there are only 600 sets worldwide. Each set is presented in a specially designed hand-made presentation box.

items.title: LEICA M (TYP 262) BUNDLE WITH SUMMARIT-M 35MM F/2.4, 75MM F/2.4, SF 40, SYSTEM CASE M
items.description: A limited edition product, light but durable, this is one of our flagship products. It’s popular and it’s the perfect gift for all occasions.

items.title: LEICA M - SILVER CHROME (TYP 240)
items.description: The new Leica M is the most innovative and versatile M-Camera that the modern M-System has ever created. It unites decades of experience in rangefinder technology with groundbreaking digital technologies: It features a completely newly developed high-resolution full-format CMOS sensor that, in combination with its high-performance processor and the legendary M-Lenses, delivers outstanding imaging results. With Live View, video, and new additional focusing methods, it is also the M for photographers who do not wish to miss out on any of what modern digital technology has to offer.

items.title: ONA UNION STREET LEATHER CAMERA AND LAPTOP BAG - WALNUT
items.description: Handcrafted with naturally-milled Italian leather, the Leather Union Street is a sleek, refined option for the modern photographer. The interior offers plenty of space for a photographer's essentials, while the leather exterior will develop a rich character with time and age. The Leather Union Street is designed to carry a 15-inch laptop, a camera, up to four lenses and small personal items. A zippered front organizer pocket provides additional space for small accessories.

items.title: ONA UNION STREET CAMERA AND LAPTOP BAG - SMOKE
items.description: Is it a camera bag or a traditional messenger? Only you will know. The Union Street’s modern styling offers a sleek alternative to the ubiquitous, boxy camera bag we all know too well. Designed to hold everything you need for a day on the go -- including your camera, a 15” laptop, up to three lenses or small accessories, and your personal items -- the Union Street is made of top-quality Waxwear ® material and lined with soft protective padding.

items.title: ONA SIDE-ACCESS CAMERA BACKPACK - SMOKE
items.description: A limited edition product, light but durable, this is one of our flagship products. It’s popular and it’s the perfect gift for all occasions.

items.title: ONA NYLON CAMPS BAY CAMERA AND LAPTOP BACKPACK - BLACK
items.description: The Nylon Camps Bay camera backpack is handcrafted from premium 1050D ballistic nylon and features full-grain Italian leather accents and solid brass hardware in a sleek gunmetal finish. Highly durable and water-resistant yet lightweight, the Camps Bay camera backpack is designed to hold a camera with a 70-200mm f/2.8 lens attached, up to seven additional lenses, most 17-inch laptops and small personal items.

items.title: FILSON PHOTOGRAPHER'S BACKPACK, TAN
items.description: A limited edition product, light but durable, this is one of our flagship products. It’s popular and it’s the perfect gift for all occasions.

items.title: FILSON HARVEY BACKPACK, MAGNUM BLACK
items.description: A limited edition product, light but durable, this is one of our flagship products. It’s popular and it’s the perfect gift for all occasions.

items.title: VIDEO DEVICES XL-B3 7.4V 7800MAH LI-ION BATTERY FOR PIX-E RECORDERS
items.description: Spare battery pack for the PIX-E Series of 4K recording monitors, such as the PIX-E5, as well as PIX 240(i) and PIX 220(i) video recorders. Compatible with Sony® L-type camcorder mount. 7.4 V, 7800 mAh.

items.title: VIDEO DEVICES SUN HOOD FOR PIX-E7
items.description:
Sun hood for PIX-E7 4K video recording monitors. Magnetic connection.

Dimensions: 7.75" W X 4.5" H X 5.375" D.

items.title: VIDEO DEVICES PIX-LR XLR AUDIO INTERFACE FOR PIX-E5 / E7
items.description: The PIX-LR features high-performance microphone preamplifiers designed by Sound Devices, LLC, a company renowned for producing innovative, award-winning audio equipment for professional sound mixers. The PIX-LR also comes equipped with superior quality limiters to prevent distortion due to excessively loud sounds, as well as high-pass filters for reducing unwanted low frequencies like wind noise. With such a wide dynamic range and superb limiters built-in, the PIX-LR ensures crisp, noise-free, audio every time.

items.title: VIDEO DEVICES PIX-E7 - 7-INCH 4K VIDEO RECORDING MONITOR
items.description:
Discerning cinematographers and videographers need high-resolution, color-accurate, sunlight-viewable monitoring with a wide angle of view.

The PIX-E7 offers everything the PIX-E5 does — and more! — in a bigger, yet still compact package. The PIX-E7 provides 'capture with confidence' monitoring thanks to its optically bonded, capacitive touch screen for maximum light transmission and minimal reflection. With 500 nit brightness and 179° angle of view, its 7-inch, 1920x1200, 323 ppi IPS display ensures accurate monitoring of clarity and color depth, even in bright sunlight..

items.title: VIDEO DEVICES HARD CASE FOR PIX-E7
items.description:
Hard case w/ cut foam insert space for the PIX-E7 plus KIT accessories.

Dimensions: 16” x 13” x 7” inches.

items.title: LOCKCIRCLE FULL METAL JACKET SYSTEM - WITH MJ BASEPLATE/TOP HANDLE/MULTI PORT/HOT SHOE - BLACK
items.description: he Metal Jacket is a special LockCircle cage project designed to fit like a glove around the Leica SL (Typ 601) camera, to enhance the cinematic feeling when shooting motion pictures.One of its features is the exclusive “Asymmetrical Cage Design” for right hand camera grabbing/control with the original Leica SL camera ergonomic feeling for “still and motion” production without limitations. The Metal Jacket is available in “Classic Black” anodized finish, or in hard anodized (Mil-Spec) “Dura-T (Tactical Grey)” or “Dura-K (Kant Titanium Brown)” for uncompromising quality.

items.title: LEICA ADAPTER FOR 21MM F/1.4 ASPH TO ACCEPT E82 FILTER
items.description: This filter adapter allows you to use E82 filters on your Leica SUMMILUX-M 21mm f/1.4 Lens.

items.title: LEICA MACRO ADAPTER M
items.description: The Leica Macro-Elmar-M 90 mm f/4 and the Macro-Adapter-M form together a convenient solution for close distance photography using the live view function of the Leica M (Typ 240). Thus it extends the field of application of the M camera to macro photography up to reproduction ratio of 1:2 by allowing focusing down to 41cm.

items.title: LEICA R ADAPTER M
items.description: The Leica M was developed for customers who want to put their excellent Leica R lenses to digital use. The new LEICA R Adapter for the first time gives users the option of deploying almost any Leica R lens ever built with their Leica M. The camera menu lists more than 20 different R lenses from wide-angle, telephoto and zoom through to macro lenses, including calibrated imaging workflow and EXIF lens detection. The wide selection of lenses opens up new application options to Leica M photographers including HD video recording in conjunction with the Leica R Vario lenses and using lenses with focal lengths longer than 135mm.

items.title: LEICA ULTRAVID COLORLINE 8 X 20 BINOCULAR -DOVE BLUE
items.description: With a close focusing limit of only 1.8 meters  the Leica Ultravid 8 x 20 Colorline is an ideal glass for use in ancient monuments, in museums, in the theater or at concerts. In other words, simply everywhere where the finest details at relatively short distances can be perfectly resolved.

items.title: LEICA ULTRAVID COLORLINE 8 X 20 BINOCULAR - LEMON YELLOW
items.description:
There is no question that these compacts are true Ultravid-class. Almost all the Ultravid-elements that the developers could miniaturize found there way into these "mini-binoculars" which fit comfortably into almost any pocket.
The use of asphericial lenses offers the observer a sharp image right to the edge whithout colour fringing and because of the short close-up distance these little Ultravids bring close up things even closer.

items.title: LEICA ULTRAVID COLORLINE 8 X 20 BINOCULAR - CAPRI BLUE
items.description: Customers can choose from a range of six leather trim options in the colors apple green, Aztec beige, Capri blue, lemon yellow, pigeon blue and cherry pink. Elegantly styled and handy, and with superior optical performance, the compact binoculars of the Leica Ultravid Colorline collection are ideal accessories for all viewing opportunities when out and about. Their maximized suppression of light reflections, the trademark of all Leica products, makes the binoculars particularly valuable when viewing under unfavorable lighting conditions, in the twilight hours, as well as under stage lighting or floodlights.

items.title: LEICA ULTRAVID 8X42 HD-PLUS BINOCULAR
items.description:
The new generation of binoculars with improved optical performance

Leica Camera AG, Wetzlar, presents a new generation of the Leica Ultravid HD 42 binoculars. In comparison with earlier models, the optical performance of the new Leica Ultravid HD-Plus 42 with respect to light transmission has been significantly improved again.

items.title: LEICA ULTRAVID 8X32 EDITION ZAGATO
items.description: In collaboration with Zagato, the Italian automotive Atelier and Total Design Center, Leica Camera AG, Wetzlar, presents a special limited edition: the Leica Ultravid 8x32 ‘Edition Zagato’. Uniting the values shared by both classical companies – premium quality, craftsmanship and tradition – the Leica Ultravid 8x32 ‘Edition Zagato’ combines unique design with cutting-edge technologies.

items.title: DODGE & BURN RANGEFINDER CLASSIC WHITE T-SHIRT - XTRA LARGE
items.description: Produced from 1940 to 1951, the IIIc was in a line of Leica cameras that established the wide use of 35mm photography and made modern photojournalism possible. Stanley Kubrick used one of these when he freelanced as a photojournalist for Look Magazine in the 1940’s.

items.title: LEICA Q (TYP 116), BLACK ANODIZED
items.description: Leica Camera proudly introduces the Leica Q (Typ 116), a symbiosis of design and superior technology. With its fast lens, easy and intuitive handling, the Leica Q gives the photographer the creative freedom that makes the difference. With a full frame sensor and the Summilux 28 mm/f1.7 ASPH lens, the Leica Q is ideal for street, architecture and landscape photography.

items.title: LEICA Q (TYP 116), TITANIUM GRAY
items.description: Leica Camera proudly presents the Leica Q Titanium Gray, an additional color variation to the Leica Q (Typ116). The Leica Q Titanium Gray, while technically identical in specification and operation to the current Leica Q (Typ 116), features a titanium color lacquered top plate, bottom plate and rear case with the lens, control dials and buttons in black. Markings on the lens are in red (compared to yellow on the black Q). With its fast lens, easy and intuitive handling, the Leica Q gives the photographer the creative freedom that makes the difference. With a full frame sensor and the Summilux 28 mm f/1.7 ASPH lens,the Leica Q is ideal for street, architecture and landscape photography.

items.title: LEICA Q LEATHER HOLSTER, BLACK
items.description: The Leica Q is protected in the leather holster and is available in moment's notice. With patented multi-angle connector and a rip-resistant adjustable belt, the holster lays flat against the body regardless if the user is wearing a T-shirt or padded jacket. The holster can be used when a handgrip is attached to the Leica Q.

items.title: LEICA SOFORT INSTANT FILM CAMERA, MINT
items.description: Leica Camera is proud to introduce the Leica Sofort, a camera that makes memories tangible on the spot. Right now. The images are truly one-of-a-kind and can never be duplicated. As part of the Leica family, the Sofort has a unique design and a sophistication that sets it apart from other instant cameras. The Sofort brings a mature, thoughtful quality to the fun instant film photography world. Available in three colors - mint, white and orange, the Leica Sofort injects fun into photography. It allows the photographer to be creative with instantly made, tangible results.

items.title: LEICA SOFORT INSTANT FILM CAMERA, ORANGE
items.description: Leica Camera is proud to introduce the Leica Sofort, a camera that makes memories tangible on the spot. Right now. The images are truly one-of-a-kind and can never be duplicated. As part of the Leica family, the Sofort has a unique design and a sophistication that sets it apart from other instant cameras. The Sofort brings a mature, thoughtful quality to the fun instant film photography world. Available in three colors - mint, white and orange, the Leica Sofort injects fun into photography. It allows the photographer to be creative with instantly made, tangible results.

items.title: LEICA SOFORT INSTANT FILM CAMERA, WHITE
items.description: Leica Camera is proud to introduce the Leica Sofort, a camera that makes memories tangible on the spot. Right now. The images are truly one-of-a-kind and can never be duplicated. As part of the Leica family, the Sofort has a unique design and a sophistication that sets it apart from other instant cameras. The Sofort brings a mature, thoughtful quality to the fun instant film photography world. Available in three colors - mint, white and orange, the Leica Sofort injects fun into photography. It allows the photographer to be creative with instantly made, tangible results.

items.title: LEICA AUTO LENS CAP, D-LUX (TYP 109)
items.description:
Automatic lens cap for the Leica D-LUX (Typ 109) which replaces the standard cap.

Turn the power on and the lens extends through the  auto lens cap.  Turn the power off and the auto lens cap retracts with the lens.  The auto lens cap helps protect the lens when not in use.

items.title: LEICA D-LUX (TYP 109)
items.description: Leica Camera proudly presents the Leica D-Lux (Typ 109), the compact camera choice of professional photographers. With a new fast, Leica DC Vario-Summilux lens, and comprehensive manual operations, the Leica D-Lux (Typ 109) offers photographers a compact, powerful and sturdy camera with a full metal housing. With a high-speed shutter and focus peaking features, the Leica D-Lux (Typ 109) also offers comprehensive manual operations and 4k video technology.

items.title: LEICA D-LUX (TYP 109) SOLID GRAY
items.description: Leica Camera proudly presents the Leica D-Lux (Typ 109) solid gray, an additional color to the existing D-Lux (Typ 109) range. This new option has a solid gray lacquered housing, silver lens and buttons. The camera is packaged with a gray leather strap, Leica CF D flash in silver, battery, battery charger, USB cable, lens cap with string, hot shoe cover, instructions, CD with instructions, warranty card, and free download of Adobe Photoshop Lightroom.

items.title: LEICA LEATHER PROTECTOR FOR D-LUX (TYP 109)
items.description:
The classic style camera protector (half case) made of soft leather is designed for the Leica D-LUX (Typ 109).

Expected availability November  2014.

items.title: ONA ROMA CAMERA INSERT AND ORGANIZER - BLACK
items.description: Only toting your DSLR and a lens? Let the Roma camera insert transform your favorite non-camera bag into a protective space for your gear. While the Roma won’t replace your carry-it-all camera bag, it's the perfect solution for light trips and shoots where only your camera and a lens are needed. But that’s not all. The Roma also has five exterior pockets that’ll help keep your stuff organized. A camera insert that’s also a bag organizer; quite the twofer if we do say so ourselves.

items.title: LEICA COLLECTION BY ONA, ROMA CAMERA INSERT AND ORGANIZER - BLACK
items.description: This practical insert with five compartments transforms almost any ordinary bag into a camera bag. The robust, water-repellent canvas of the insert offers sufficient protection for valuable equipment and real leather grips to make it easier to remove from bags. This cleverly designed combination of a bag and an organizer is exactly the right thing for photographers to take along when they need only a camera, a lens and a couple of small items.

items.title: ARTISAN & ARTIST* ACAM BAG INSERT - SMALL
items.description: This insert is an extra protective divider for cameras and lenses designed for the Artisan & Artist* 1100 series camera bags. You can also use these inserts to use with your own favorite bag to carry around your camera and lenses. This Artisan & Artist* inserts measure:

items.title: ARTISAN & ARTIST* LMB M9 HALF CASE HAND GRIP-BLACK
items.description: Protect and carry your Leica M9 in style with this handmade Italian leather half case from Artisan & Artist*. This case is designed to fit the M9 with the handgrip.

items.title: ARTISAN & ARTIST LMB MP HALF CASE, BROWN
items.description: Protect and carry your Leica M-P (Typ 240) in style with this handmade Italian leather half case from Artisan & Artist*.

items.title: ARTE DI MANO M8/M9/M-E HALF CASE WITH THUMB PAD- MINERVA BLACK
items.description: This case is crafted to complement the Leica M8, M9, M-E and M Monochrom (1st Version) digital cameras. Made of impressible tanned leather, this half case is soft to the touch and fits snugly with accented snaps. Case also features an embedded metal tripod mount and a small built-in thumb rest. Handmade in Korea by master leather artisans, this soft leather case will help improve your grip and also protect your Leica M8, M9 or M-E.

items.title: ARTE DI MANO M/M-P (TYP 240) OPEN STYLE HALF CASE WITH BATTERY ACCESS DOOR- BARENIA TAN
items.description: This Arte di Mano half is designed to fit the Leica M/M-P (Typ 240), M Monochrom (Typ 246) and M (Typ 262). It is made of impressible tanned leather and is soft to the touch.This unique half case replaces your camera's bottom plate and allows easy access to the battery and memory card. The half case is secured to the camera by a tripod mount screw. Handmade in Korea by master leather artisans, this soft leather case will help improve your grip, protect your Leica M, and make battery changes easier.

items.title: WRIST STRAP, ARTISAN & ARTIST, SILK GREEN
items.description: A hand strap and a carrying strap in plaited green-brown silk are available separately as optional camera accessories to match the Artisan & Artist Edition for Leica system bag. The elaborate plaiting process makes them exceptionally strong and tear-resistant. Protective tabs for the hand-sewn leather end pieces protect the camera body and prevent scratching.

items.title: LEICA X WRIST CARRYING STRAP
items.description: A limited edition product, light but durable, this is one of our flagship products. It’s popular and it’s the perfect gift for all occasions.

items.title: LEICA TRADITIONAL CARRYING STRAP TANNED LEATHER COGNAC
items.description: Classic, elegant, robust, stylish, attractive, discreet, individual: Anyone who has customized his or her Leica MP or M7 according to their own wishes as part of the à la carte system will surely also want the same uncompromising style when it comes to accessories. That is why these top quality camera-carrying straps are available in all the leather variants of the Leica à la carte range.

items.title: LEICA TRADITIONAL CARRYING STRAP BOX CALF LEATHER DARK BROWN
items.description: Classic, elegant, robust, stylish, attractive, discreet, individual: Anyone who has customized his or her Leica MP or M7 according to their own wishes as part of the à la carte system will surely also want the same uncompromising style when it comes to accessories. That is why these top quality camera-carrying straps are available in all the leather variants of the Leica à la carte range.
